plot: As his owner and lifelong friend moves away, a raccoon reflects on happier times with her and wonders what will happen next.
title: Milo
plot_es: As his owner and lifelong friend moves away, a raccoon reflects on happier times with her and wonders what will happen next.
plot_en: As his owner and lifelong friend moves away, a raccoon reflects on happier times with her and wonders what will happen next.
